channel.title: RSPS Cheat Engine Money Glitch
channel.description: I've decided to make a video to you people the Money/Noted Items Glitch. It's not really a glitch because you use a program, anyways here's the video link: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mbPYu3CgrAo]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mbPYu3CgrAo[/url] I saw on another website some guy was like, "HOW DO YOU FIX THE F*CKING CHEAT ENGINE DUPE!@!@?!?!@#?!@?". I just laughed.. If you think you can dupe with Cheat Engine your crazy. If just changes values. And BTW Sorry I didn't know if this was in the right spot or not, any mod just move it if it's in the wrong section. Also there's an audio swap processing for the video right now, fucking copyright issues. lol Anyways hope you enjoy the video.

item.title: RSPS Cheat Engine Money Glitch
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:36, topic:359916”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=456356.msg3619950#msg3619950 date=1307312735]

The way that they “dupe” with a cheat engine is to buy items in shops for 1g. Like say you had a bucket in a shop, its set to 1gp, if you change the value of that item to lets say a redphat. Redphats aren’t normally sold in shops so the default price is pretty low, you can then buy that item in that show for the low price. This of course is very very easy to fix if you have a brain…

Still isn’t possible with Cheat Engine because it’s not sending packets or sending anything to the server.

Re read what I said, you obviously didnt.

Actually what you said sort of mind-fucked me.
[/quote]
Ah. :P[/quote]
I re-read it about 8-10 times and I couldn’t understand it, sorry

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Cheat Engine Money Glitch
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Any decent shop manager stores the IDs server sided, I’ve never heard of one that didn’t

The more common one is to spawn ground items client-sided, then pick them up. If the server doesn’t check if a ground item exists, you basically spawn items.

Read full topic

item.title: RSPS Cheat Engine Money Glitch
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Majin Goten, post:17, topic:359916”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=456356.msg3341360#msg3341360 date=1284399298]

This actually works on poorly written servers because they don’t do item checks on some interfaces (Try a shop interface)

The odds of finding a server badly enough programmed where cheat engine works what’s the point of even having of a server and anyways most people just a leech a server that has it fixed.

completely wrong you can exploit pretty much every server running. Want a perfect example to test? on virtually all servers you can pull items from the bank into your inventory without being at a bank simply by sending the packet. Also most servers have a so called “admin panel” if you know the id of the buttons on these panels you have a good chance of using the features simply by sending the button clicking packet.

another simple example you can use on most servers you can change your characters appearance by simply sending the design packet. Most servers do not check for negative numbers on this packet so if you send a negative value you will crash any client within your view area.
[/quote]

You have a point, but “Cheat Engine” does not send packets to the server. It only freezes a value and changes it, like artmoney does. Cheat Engine only works for client-side games, not server-side.

-Wyatt[/quote]

Ive tested this before on a running server, all you have to do is change the money value with cheat engine and then open up the bank interface from a command client side. Servers don’t check the bank when it is opened by something other then server side. I did this to a devolution server.

Read full topic
